attributes.action: ensure equality in the honours system for our Paralympic heroes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Paralympic games sadly do not attract the attention of their Olympic cousins, but we acknowledge that the Beijing games have been a huge success for all our athletes, Olympic and Paralympic.

Many of the Paralympians have reached the respective pinnacles of their sports and shown tremendous dedication to get there comfortably on a par with that of Olympians.

We petition the government to ensure that the Paralympic successes in Beijing are treated as equal to the Olympic examples: if the country sees fit to bestow honours upon members of the Olympic team, that it provides the same level of recognition to Paralympic competitors, regardless of the level of popular media attention and consequent public perception towards the games.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
